My Work

Here's What I've Created so far...

TISSOT WATCH STORE Github

Built in html, css, javascript, and node.js, this website uses the Stripe Api to make payments for buying Tissot watches online. But i dont have my own Warehouse to ship it to you so dont enter your creditcard information for your own safety please, it wont make a transaction if you tried. but you can make a fake payment with 4242 4242 4242 4242 and an expiry date in the future to test it out :)

SPACETIME TODAY Github

Built in html, css, and javascript, this website uses the NASA APOD (Astronomical Picture of the Day) API to display cards with images that Nasa has taken through out the week, with the choice to see what NASA has discovered on your Birthday, unless you were born befor 1995... sadly NASA did not have an API before then i guess...

JUMP START CAREER Github

Built in the MERN stack (mongodb, express, react, and node.js) this was by far the most challenging web app i have made so far, though the styles may seem a bit off, it behind the scenes uses password hashing, Sendgring to send cv's and verification codes though emails, integrated with the google places api to search for jobs within a 50km radius, and more.

Task Manager RRST API Github

Built in Node.js, mongodb, and express... this is a REST API that Manages your tasks, create an account, and keep your tasks private from other users, it also hashes passwords with bcrypt, so i the developer cant even access them... until i log into my mongodb account that is. this REST API is basically the foundation of most REST API's out there, i included it because the code is super clean. and if you are to take a look at my code, you should look at this one most of all.
